div.p: THAT MEANS I WAS YOUNGER THAN THEY WERE WHEN THEY WERE IN
SCHOOL. FINALLY TONIGHT TIP OF THE DAY.
YOUR INPUT ON THE BIL O’REILLY,Y WAS THE AMBUSH OF HILLARY
CLINTON FAIR? IS IT RIGHT TO CONFRONT HER IN A
RUDE MANNER? IS IT THE CORRECT THING TO DO?
THAT’S WHAT THE POLL IS ABOUT. WE HOPE YOU HELP US OUT WITH IT.
THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOXNEWS
